Title: Chastnyy detektiv, ili operatsiya 'Kooperatsiya'
Actors: Dmitriy Kharatyan, Irina Feofanova, Spartak Mishulin
Plot: The first private enterprises are started in the Soviet Union in the late 80s. A gang of bad guys, owners of a private restroom, kidnap a good guy - owner of a toy store. Private eye Dmitri's first job is to try and free the store...
